constructor-arg.value: SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating, t1.price, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t3.name ORDER BY t3.id DESC SEPARATOR ', ') genres, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t4.country_name ORDER BY t4.country_name DESC SEPARATOR ', ') countries FROM movie t1 JOIN movie_genre t2 ON t1.id = t2.movie_id JOIN genre t3 ON t2.genre_id = t3.id JOIN movie_country t4 on t1.id = t4.movie_id GROUP BY t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating, t1.price;
